title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 225.3 - Violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 225.3 - Violations

State Regulations
A contravention of this Part shall be deemed to be an unfair method of competition or an unfair or deceptive act and practice in the conduct of the business of insurance in this State and shall be deemed to be a trade practice constituting a determined violation, as defined in section
2402 (c)
of the Insurance Law and shall be a violation of section
2403
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
225.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
